message.raw: Farm actual basis matrix construction to a separate method that is only called when the pencils create the matrices.  This will allow you to use a PrimaryBasis object as a secondary basis without carrying around its Tau matrices (which will never be needed).
message.html: Farm actual basis matrix construction to a separate method that is only called when the pencils create the matrices. This will allow you to use a PrimaryBasis object as a secondary basis without carrying around its Tau matrices (which will never be needed).
